thread.title: InventHelp Inventor Designs Protective Accessory for Outdoor Enthusiasts (KOC-106)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Inventor Designs Protective Accessory for Outdoor Enthusiasts (KOC-106) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InventHelp Inventor Designs Protective Accessory for Outdoor Enthusiasts (KOC-106)
text:
A Pittsburgh-based invention firm, InventHelp is submitting the CLEAR VISION to companies for their consideration.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 21, 2015
Do you wish there was a way to prevent pesky insects from swarming around the head and face during outdoor activities? An inventor, from Dieppe, New Brunswick, Canada, thought there could be a better way, so he invented the CLEAR VISION.
The CLEAR VISION enables the user to see clearly during an outdoor activity. It also prevents mosquitoes and other insects from flying around the head, face and eyes. As a result, it enhances comfort and safety and it could help to make outdoor activity more enjoyable. The invention features a protective design that is ideal for outdoor enthusiasts, campers, hikers and fishermen. Additionally, the CLEAR VISION is producible in design variations and a prototype is available.
The inventor described his inspiration for the invention. “I came up with this idea while trout fishing. I thought there needed to be a better way to protect the face from bugs without obstructing the vision, so I invented this.”
The original design was submitted to the Telemarketing office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-KOC-106, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
